title: PBE Page Redirecting to Old Link and Doesn't Work

embed.description: Hello Summoners, PBE signups are closed until further notice. The website has been in a poorly functioning state for a while now and we are trying to address all the problems at once instead of throwing a band-aid over it.

body: I am currently trying to sign up for the PBE but it always shows "Something went wrong. Please try refreshing your page and try again." When I click on the link shown above because it was mentioned to solve some problems, it redirects me to a white screen and it says, "Page Not Found." I don't know what to do and I really want to sign up for the PBE. Please help.

replies.body: Try [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe) instead! Be aware that page is still under a lot of traffic so it might take a bit before it let's you fully signup.
